title: Lost LP from remake after being connected to the game.
body: During the loading screen it came up that my internet was disconnected (while in a discord call) and I ended up joining late. After I reconnected the remake vote came up (after I teleported to lane and bought items) and 2 people voted for a remake. so in a 2v3 vote the 2 people got the remake to go through losing me 16 LP. I don't understand why remake is an option after the player reconnects and is in lane. /rant

replies.body: so i've been going through the forums and almost every single time i see a rioter post a response it's almost looks like copy paste. i see a situation and it's either somehow our fault still no matter what the problem is or its us having a bad connection. to you sir or madam who posted this if it makes you feel better ever since the preseason started i have been getting bug splated and dced and everything in between, so its not just you man but i'm not the only person to post something about the bad connection lately and i just keep seeing well here us this connection issues guide to help. i'm sorry but its almost feel like this game has just become a giant money grab from when i was playing in season 5 to now almost 3 years later

Hey I looked into this for you, but it looks like you were afk for the match so it resulted in a /Remake.  Per the [remake guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686--Remake-FAQ), you were gone for long enough to cause it to trigger.  If you're having issues reaching the game server, or having hiccups, you may want to run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tighten things up.
